questions.question_text: What are the baseline asset lifecycle automation flows provided by the Hardware Asset Management (HAM) plugin? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABF
ABF as per the NowLearning: Automated Stock Management: 
- Asset order
- Bulk stack order
- Request loaner asset
- Asset refresh
- Asset lease expiration
- Asset disposal
- Asset order

questions.question_text: What plugin helps alleviate inconsistencies in company names?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer: B. Normalization Data Services

Explanation: "The Normalization Data Services plugin helps maintain consistency for table fields that refer to a company name."

Souce: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-platform-administration/page/administer/normalization/concept/c_NormalizationOverview.html

Selected Answer: B
Page 106 of Vancouver HAMF text
